body.name: VASAGLE Bookshelf, 6-Tier Open Bookcase with Adjustable Storage Shelves, Floor Standing Unit, Rustic Brown ULBC166X01
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 47 mins
features: [Spacious] This 6-tier bookcase sized 9.4”D x 23.6”W x 63.1”H utilizes vertical space to display your favorite books or special treasures. This keeps them easily accessible in the living room, study, or bedroom

[Adjustable Shelves] Each of the first 2 shelves can be adjusted to 3 height positions (up or down 1.2"), making the shelf spacing adjustable between 8.7-11", so tall books, artwork, or storage boxes can easily fit in this bookshelf
[Durable and Strong] Made of 0.6” thick particleboard, this bookcase is durable and offers strong support for heavy books, being able to hold up to 22 lb per tier
[Stable and Safe] The slot-in back panel and H-shaped structure enhance the stability of the bookshelf. The anti-tip kit included lets you secure it to the wall for safe use
[Easy to Assemble] No difficult assembly here. Thanks to the numbered parts and easy-to-follow, detailed instructions, you’ll get this storage shelf assembled in no time

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Shelves Each of the first 2 shelves can be adjusted to 3 height positions to fit items of different heights. Anti-Tip Kit Use the anti-tip kit included to secure the bookshelf to the wall, offering a safe environment for your family. Quality Material This bookcase made of quality particleboard is durable for lasting use and sturdy to hold heavy books.

Savvy Storage This multi-tier bookcase provides efficient vertical storage, maximizing your storage space in the living room, home office, or bedroom. Some of the shelves are adjustable, perfect for keeping books of various heights and other decorations. Stylish Look With clean lines and a beautiful finish, this bookcase is sure to become a statement piece in your home. Multiple finishes are available to match your home decor. Specifications: Color: Rustic BrownMaterial: ParticleboardProduct Size: 9.4”D x 23.6”W x 63.1”H (24 x 60 x 160.5 cm)Product Weight: 45.1 lb (20.5 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity per Shelf: 22 lb (10 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity Total: 132 lb (60 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Bookcase1 x Accessory Kit1 x Anti-Tip Kit1 x Instructions VASAGLE Notes: For safety reasons, children are not allowed to climb on or play with the bookshelf.Please attach the bookcase to the wall with the included anti-tip kit for safety.For daily maintenance, wipe with a damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great book case
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase is small but well made and looks nice. It was easy to put together as well. it fit perfectly avout 20 books which is what I needed it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a good bookshelf, but...
reviews.reviewText: Though it isn't important in terms of reviews I moved not too long ago. It was late summer of '23. Though I had bought a bookshelf for manga I put off getting another one for the rest of the books and the piles were gradually growing by the month.So I bought this one.Pros:- Assembly isn't too difficult. Any difficulty I had was mostly because I decided to put it together alone.- Perfect size for a manga shelf.- Looks Great.Cons:- Quite a few of the books that I wanted to put on this shelf wouldn't fit because they were just a little too big. Even though the shelves are adjustable I feel making room for the books that wouldn't fit with take away space from other books and I wouldn't be able to have it sorted as I would have liked.- It was shorter than I thought it would be with five tiers.Luckily since the spacing is perfect for my manga collection I decided to transfer the manga from my other shelf and used the other shelf for the books I've had piled up. So even though the outcome wasn't as I had wanted it still worked out.These shelves are good as long as the books you want to put on here are not bigger than roughly 9 inches. Since the books I get from Book of the Month are just slightly bigger they didn't quite fit. [This is if the shelves are evenly spaced.]I will probably buy another since my manga collection already filled this shelving unit and will continue to grow. Just probably won't be used for non-manga as most of my books came from Book of the Month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Average particle Board at a higher Price
reviews.reviewText: I needed a Shelving Unit to fit a specific space. I found this same model available from big box retailers in the 6 foot version for half the price. But, I needed the shorter 52.7" version which proved difficult to find anywhere but here. The packaging was good, nothing was damaged. The instructions were very clear and easy to follow. It came with a screwdriver and allen key. The only thing not provided was a hammer for the feet. The hardware was a little below average and it was a good thing they gave some extras of each piece as some were unusable. Like a missing phillips head, it was just smooth. And a cracked apart cam. Since this unit is black I was puzzled by the white cover for the wall attachment and the light brown plastic feet. The particle board pieces were nicely made and labeled. The holes were a little off , but worked without a noticeable misalignment. It was only noticeable to Me, who tried to hold it square while tightening. Read the other reviews carefully. Some people do not know how to follow instructions and blame the product. One such review complains about the back panel having tape on the front that looks horrible. In actuality they put the rear panel in backwards as seen in their photo. When assembled it is sturdy for what it is. I would recommend the bracket that holds it to the wall, it is skinny and with some weight on it could fall forward. And remember this is a really inexpensive shelving unit. I don't think it should be called a Bookshelf as books are heavy and I don't think you could put a row of books on each shelf. I am using this to hold 3D Printer Filament, so I am below the 11 pound per shelf limit. All in all, I am happy I could find it in exactly the size I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really exceptional for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bookshelf is quite solid and looks great. Easy to assemble. Definitely good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely gorgeous bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is so beautiful. It wasn't difficult to put together just a bit time-consuming and messy. Not much more so than any other furniture I've assembled, though. I like that this was one compact, as it fits perfectly in the space we need it to. Holds a LOT of stuff, and every shelf is adjustable except for the very middle one. We anchored this to our wall so our toddler can play with the bottom shelves and it won't fall over.The stickers are a little difficult to remove so we just kept a few in there. They're not noticeable. Stability at a four because the back is a flimsy sort of wood, so if we didn't anchor it I feel like it wouldn't have enough weight to keep it from falling over. We also have it on a carpet but a hardwood floor would keep it more stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small, sturdy , nice looking shelf. Easy to put together. Working well for what we needed. May get another in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the money, its a good deal. Dont expect a 400 dollar bookshelf. It looks nice, does the job. Fairly easy to assemble. Worth every penny....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shelves are too short
reviews.reviewText: All and all it is a good quality product but unfortunately there is a major flaw: the shelves are short leaving a gap between them and the sides. We will keep the product but quality control could be a little better
Strong and sturdy and look really nice shelve.Can store most of my books and my stuff.
Was easy to build and works great. Hoping they come back in stock so we can buy another matching one

We (so far) got the Vasagle:- (5ft+) ladder shelf- retro bookcase- storage shelf cabinet- writing/pc tableand have received and assembled the first three on that list so far.....Apart from the fact that they are 🇨🇦 locally shipped for free (prime) quickly and have a return policy, each of these came extremely well packaged, with foam, plastics etc. The boxes are rather heavy and compact.Each part came assigned with a part number and matching screws etc were very neatly packaged in separate compartments. The instructions were mainly diagram based and if you look at each part shown on them diligently (and compare to each part you are about to use - especially the amount and location of screw holes) you can’t go wrong !TIPS: (1) as they recommend, better two people build it/help out to prevent shelves and panels tipping over with only few screws in - esp. in beginning stages. (2) It comes with allen keys, but I suggest you hold a bigger flat point plus a smaller star screwdriver close by for assembly.Each of these items received thus far have EXCEEDED our expectations from the word go by far. We’ve found no flaws, no missing items or parts at all, no flimsyness. They have been WELL designed and the materials are fabulous. The assembled products look fantastic too ! Innovative and modern as well. WAY, WAY better quality than I have seen at many local retailers ! ..... they are sturdy and the price of these are fantastic !I can’t give anything but 5⭐️ for each of these !
It fits in a narrow place and is perfectly sized for books. I use this for my home office. Very good construction and design
